archimate:Requirement.name: PM.2.2.2b: b) difference between critical information, which needs to be available and have integrity (e.g. product prices/exchange rates, manufacturing information and medical records) and sensitive information, which can only be disclosed to authorised individuals (e.g. product designs, merger and acquisition plans, and business strategy information).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
